org.jetel.connection.nosql

Class DefaultReplacementHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.nosql.AbstractReplacementHelper
      • org.jetel.connection.nosql.DefaultReplacementHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplacementHelper

    public class DefaultReplacementHelper
extends AbstractReplacementHelper
    Default ReplacementHelper implementation.

    Uses simple placeholder substitution, fails if the replacement value is null.
